titleInfo.title: Letter, President Jimmy Carter to Representative John Breaux

mods.abstract: A letter from President Jimmy Carter to Representative John Breaux. The letter accompanied the pen Carter used to sign the Salmon and Steelhead Conservation and Enhancement Act and the American Fisheries Promotion Act into law.

titleInfo.title: John B. Breaux Collection, Mss. 4922 B6

copyInformation.subLocation: LSU Special Collections: Political Papers Collection

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
